question: Who is the author of the book "Girl Power: Indian Women Who Broke The Rules"?
explanation: The book titled \"Girl Power: Indian Women Who Broke The Rules\" has been authored by Neha J Hiranandani. It gives details the struggles and achievements of 50 remarkable women. The book features contemporary women like Olympic medallist PV Sindhu as well as historical figures like the warrior queen Abbakka of Chowta dynasty who singlehandedly defeated the Portuguese six times. And also about life of the octogenarian sharpshooter - Â Chandro Tomar, who is popularly known as \'Revolver Dadi\'.
